mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (bookName, bookAuthor, bookLanguage, bookVersion, bookDepreciation, bookPrice, bookStock, bookTags, bookImageUrl, bookDescription, bookCreateTime) VALUES (#{bookName}, #{bookAuthor}, #{bookLanguage}, #{bookVersion}, #{bookDepreciation}, #{bookPrice}, #{bookStock}, #{bookTags}, #{bookImageUrl}, #{bookDescription}, #{bookCreateTime})
